Detailed Description

nitf_LookupTable - Object representing the image sub-header lookup table

The nitf_LookupTable object represents the image sub-header lookup these tables are stored in the sub-header and are used to map the image data in some representations. These objects appear as a field in the nitf_BandInfo object.
